text: Mohammed Nur (born 2 December 2002) is a Nigerian international footballer who plays for El-Kanemi Warriors, as a striker. ==Career== He has played club football for El-Kanemi Warriors. He made his international debut for Nigeria in 2018. Nur was selected for the 2018 African Nations Championship squad and made history as the youngest player to ever feature in the competition at the age of 15. ==References== Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:Nigeria international footballers Category:El-Kanemi Warriors F.C. players Category:Association football forwards
title: Mohammed Nur
